text: The Beautiful Corsair (Italian: La bella corsara) is a 1928 Italian silent film directed by Wladimiro De Liguoro and starring Rina De Liguoro, Bruto Castellani and Carlos Montes.Parish p.147 ==Cast== * Rina De Liguoro as La bella corsara * Carlos Montes as Il corsaro della nave nemica * Bruto Castellani as L'altro corsaro == References == == Bibliography == * Monaco, James. Film Actors Guide. Scarecrow Press, 1977. == External links == * Category:1928 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian silent feature films Category:Italian-language films Category:Films directed by Wladimiro De Liguoro Category:Italian black-and-white films Category:Pirate films
title: The Beautiful Corsair
